caption.p: One month follow-up of S100A9, IRAK3, IL1R2, GAP7, and NFKBIA in surviving melioidosis patients over the course of illness. Whole blood samples from melioidosis survivors ( n = 8) were collected at the various times from diagnosis (day 0, day 5, day 12, and day 28). The P-values were calculated by Mann–Whitney test. Data of healthy individuals were plotted as the controls.
